verses.verse: The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> concerning <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7392>riding<s%> on a <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> and is about to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> The <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H5128>tremble<s%> at His <S%H6440>presence,<s%> And the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H4549>melt<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> them.

"So I will <S%H5526>incite<s%> <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> against <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> And they will <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> against his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H5892>City<s%> against <S%H5892>city,<s%> [and] <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> against <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

"Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will be <S%H1238>demoralized<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> them; And I will <S%H1104>confound<s%> their <S%H6098>strategy,<s%> So that they will <S%H1875>resort<s%> to <S%H457>idols<s%> and <S%H9008>ghosts<s%> of the <S%H9008>dead,<s%> And to <S%H178>mediums<s%> and <S%H3049>spiritists.<s%>

"Moreover, I will <S%H5534>deliver<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H7186>cruel<s%> <S%H113>master,<s%> And a <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%> will <S%H5405>dry<s%> up, And the <S%H5104>river<s%> will be <S%H9162>parched<s%> and <S%H3001>dry.<s%>

And the <S%H5104>canals<s%> will <S%H9107>emit<s%> a <S%H9107>stench,<s%> The <S%H2975>streams<s%> of <S%H4693>Egypt<s%> will <S%H1809>thin<s%> out and <S%H9162>dry<s%> up; The <S%H7070>reeds<s%> and <S%H5488>rushes<s%> will <S%H7060>rot<s%> <S%H7060>away.<s%>

The <S%H6169>bulrushes<s%> by the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> by the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4218>sown<s%> <S%H4218>fields<s%> by the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> Will <S%H3001>become<s%> <S%H3001>dry,<s%> be <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H5086>away,<s%> and be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more.<s%>

And the <S%H1728>fishermen<s%> will <S%H578>lament,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H7993>cast<s%> a <S%H2443>line<s%> into the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> will <S%H56>mourn,<s%> And those who <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H9262>nets<s%> on the <S%H4325>waters<s%> will <S%H535>pine<s%> <S%H535>away.<s%>

Moreover, the <S%H5647>manufacturers<s%> of <S%H6593>linen<s%> made from <S%H8305>combed<s%> <S%H6593>flax<s%> And the <S%H707>weavers<s%> of <S%H9125>white<s%> <S%H9125>cloth<s%> will be <S%H954>utterly<s%> <S%H954>dejected.<s%>
And the <S%H8356>pillars<s%> [of Egypt] will be <S%H1792>crushed;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H7938>hired<s%> <S%H6213>laborers<s%> will be <S%H99>grieved<s%> in <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> are <S%H389>mere<s%> <S%H191>fools;<s%> The <S%H6098>advice<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2450>wisest<s%> <S%H3289>advisers<s%> has <S%H9059>become<s%> <S%H9059>stupid.<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> can you [men] <S%H559>say<s%> to Pharaoh, "I am a <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>"?

<S%H645>Well<s%> <S%H645>then,<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> are your <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%>? <S%H4994>Please<s%> let them <S%H5046>tell<s%> you, And let them <S%H3045>understand<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> Has <S%H3289>purposed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> have <S%H2973>acted<s%> <S%H2973>foolishly,<s%> The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> are <S%H5378>deluded;<s%> [Those who are] the <S%H6438>cornerstone<s%> of her <S%H7626>tribes<s%> Have <S%H8582>led<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H8582>astray.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H4537>mixed<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> her a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H5773>distortion;<s%> They have <S%H8582>led<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that it <S%H4639>does,<s%> As a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> <S%H7910>man<s%> <S%H8582>staggers<s%> in his <S%H9514>vomit.<s%>

And there will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> for <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> [its] <S%H7218>head<s%> or <S%H2180>tail,<s%> [its] <S%H3712>palm<s%> <S%H3712>branch<s%> or <S%H100>bulrush,<s%> may <S%H6213>do.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> like <S%H802>women,<s%> and they will <S%H2729>tremble<s%> and be in <S%H6342>dread<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H5130>waving<s%> of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He is going to <S%H5130>wave<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

And the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2283>terror<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> it is <S%H2142>mentioned<s%> will be in <S%H6342>dread<s%> of it, <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H6098>purpose<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He is <S%H3289>purposing<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will be <S%H1696>speaking<s%> the <S%H8193>language<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> and <S%H7650>swearing<s%> [allegiance] to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> will be <S%H559>called<s%> the <S%H5892>City<s%> of <S%H2041>Destruction.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there will be an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> its <S%H1366>border.<s%>

And it will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> and a <S%H5707>witness<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for they will <S%H6817>cry<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H3905>oppressors,<s%> and He will <S%H7971>send<s%> them a <S%H3467>Savior<s%> and a <S%H9538>Champion,<s%> and He will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them.

Thus the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3045>make<s%> Himself <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in that <S%H3117>day.<s%> They will even <S%H5647>worship<s%> with <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> and <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and will <S%H5087>make<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H9608>perform<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5062>strike<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5062>striking<s%> but <S%H7495>healing;<s%> so they will <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He will <S%H6279>respond<s%> to them and will <S%H7495>heal<s%> them.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there will be a <S%H4546>highway<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> into <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H5647>worship<s%> with the <S%H804>Assyrians.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be the <S%H7992>third<s%> [party] with <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

<S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> is <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H804>Assyria<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of My <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> My <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>"
